description:
It`s the Obon holidays, and Komi is visiting her grandma`s house. She can`t help but feel a little awkward around her extended family.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just Obon. / It`s Just a Festival. / It`s Just the End of Summer.
Obon Desu. / Omatsuri Desu. / Natsuyasumi mo Owari Desu.
お盆です. / お祭りです. / 夏休みも終わりです.
